entries.heading: Self Study of Web Development
entries.text: During this period I did learn web development on my own. On my own being with only the help of the internet. During this time I earned the certificate 'CS50's Web Programming with Python and JavaScript' by HarvardX and also created this portfolio. The main goal was learning new technologies.

entries.heading: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
entries.text: This marks my first real introduction to coding and to computer science. I learned a lot of concepts and areas of computer science.
